name: Death Again (itch)
description:
LEADERBOARD INFO - If you'd like to get your name on the official online leaderboards, the (current) only way is through the downloadable version! Sorry about that!

Death Again is a platformer where to progress, you must die and jump off of the corpses of your past life!  As morbid as it may seem, you must attempt to get through this stage as quickly as possible by strategically impaling yourself on spikes to be able to jump off of your dead body! ... Have fun! :D

Oh yeah, and this was made in 12 hours!
